courses.title: Introduction to Music Theory
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of music theory, including notation, scales, chords, and rhythm.

courses.title: Advanced Guitar Techniques
courses.description: Master advanced guitar techniques such as fingerpicking, sweep picking, and tapping.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation
courses.description: Learn the art of improvisation in the jazz style, focusing on scales, modes, and chord progressions.

courses.title: Music Production with Ableton Live
courses.description: A comprehensive course on music production using Ableton Live, covering recording, editing, and mixing.

courses.title: History of Classical Music
courses.description: Explore the history of classical music from the Baroque period to the 20th century.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Learn to produce electronic music using various digital audio workstations and techniques.

courses.title: Vocal Training for Beginners
courses.description: Develop your vocal skills with exercises and techniques designed for beginners.

courses.title: Piano for All Levels
courses.description: Comprehensive piano lessons for beginners to advanced players.

courses.title: Songwriting Techniques
courses.description: Learn the art of songwriting, from lyrics to melody creation.

courses.title: Classical Guitar Mastery
courses.description: Advanced techniques and pieces for classical guitar enthusiasts.
